item.description:
This event is a must if you're a Boston business professional, entrepreneur or Social Media Pro and looking to meet new people/contacts. Meet with other entrepreneurs, small business owners and specialists in fields of Law, Creative, Finance, E-Commerce, Social Media, Marketing and more...

We will be on the 2nd Floor Mezzanine!

There will be a mingle portion early in the evening. Once everyone has arrived, we will move to a private space so that we can each deliver a 30 second pitch of our professional skills/service.

Bring promotional items, postcards, business cards if you have them!

Cash bar will also be available.


ADMISSION:
$5 in advance
$10 at the door
PRE-PAY HERE - http://bostonmoxieint...


INCLUDES:
Private Space to Facilitate Pitch Portion
Light nibbles (Think fruit, cheese, crudite)


HOW IT WILL WORK:
7:00PM: Check in & Informal Networking

7:30 - 8:00 - Each attendee gives a 30 second pitch of their business, service or skills

8:00-9:30 PM: Targeted networking & socializing

Sync up with business professionals to promote yourself and your business. Explore new business opportunities, make business contacts and form strategic partnerships with other successful professionals, entrepreneurs and business owners. You`ll be able to mix and mingle freely with other attendees so you can meet as many other networkers as possible.

MEET PROFESSIONALS IN THE FOLLOWING INDUSTRIES:
*Social Media/Web 2.0 Specialists
*Finance
*Event Planning
*Advertising
*Wellness
*IT
*Law
*Non-Profits
..and more

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Professionals Networking Reception
